title: Black + Decker One Touch Chopper
description:
Enjoy fast and easy chopping or mincing at the touch of a button! With a 1½-cup capacity, a stay-sharp blade and one-touch pulse control, you’ll get great results with ease. Plus a safety lock lid offers greater security and added peace of mind during use.

Stay-Sharp Blade
Safety Locking Lid
One-Touch Pulse Button Control
1½-Cup Bowl Capacity
Dishwasher-Safe Removable Parts
Compact Design
Cord Storage
